post.text: Donald Trump construyó su campaña demonizando a inmigrantes y sus familias. Lo escuchamos claramente desde la primera vez. (Y la segunda vez, y la tercera, cuarta...).

comment.author: Eden
comment.text: Hillary Clinton speaks of bridges, but built 4 miles of wall around the D.N.C and another wall around the stage. Hillary Clinton is a LIAR and CRIMINAL and a THIEF and a RACIST.

replies.author: Amanda
replies.text: Words Matter... Oops, Hill, did it, again.... Another 'short circuit'? Google... Hillary Clinton, Council on Foreign Affairs 2006 speech on immigration... Hill said "We need a strong border.". Hill said "illegal immigration hurts American workers.". No she didn't? Yes, she did girl! Taco bowl, please... Just SayN :)

replies.author: Amanda
replies.text: Pay 4 Play Hmmmmm ? If Hill had any respect for the LGBTQ community, women and girls.... Her and her hubby would give back the millions that was donated to the Clinton's, by countries that have Sharia law/support. Give the money back, girl! Has anyone seen Hill? I need some hot sauce, check your purse, girl! Pandering little twit, disgusting! Just SayN :)

replies.author: Amanda
replies.text: Temperament.... All in favor of the Iraq war... Senator Clinton: Yea! Ringgggg, Ringgggg... Madame Secretary, Benghazi calling... Zzzzzzzzzzz Secretary Clinton? Secretary?
